body.para: Ok, its at the beginning of the method endUline, you have :

and after : " this.currentlayer = new lz.drawViewNew(this,{ name:tempName,x:minx-1-(this.currentulinelineWidth, y:miny-1-(this.currentulinelineWidth), width:(width+this.currentlinelineWidth), height:(width+this.currentlinelineWidth), opacity:this.currentulineOpacity}); "
I don't know if theses variables are responsible of the shifting of the Uline or maybe the update of variables x1,y1,x2,y2.
